name: AmbientVisualsSheepCounter
0:
”Alexa, start Sheep Counter”
”Alexa, open Sheep Counter”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: sheep counter
des:
Counting sheep to 1000 with Video. This is the perfect skill for falling asleep easily. If you got an Echo Spot or Echo Show you can even watch sheep jumping in a seamless loop.

Impress your guests with fascinating screensaver on Echo Show and Echo Spot.

You can still use your Echo device while video and audio are playing as Alexa returns to the playback after setting a timer or asking for the time. Just what you would expect from a good screensaver.

Search for “Ambient Visuals” in the skill store or check out the "Screensaver - The Collection" skill and you’ll get even more screensaver of this kind.

We’re looking forward to receiving your feedback and suggestions on how to improve the experience even more.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
